hero.description: I turn ideas into functional and elegant digital solutions. Specialized in creating modern, high-performance web experiences.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
paragraphs: I'm Gabriel, a professional specialized in digital solutions development. With over 4 years of market experience, I've worked on various complex projects that have allowed me to develop advanced technical skills and efficient problem-solving capabilities.

My professional journey began as a Backend Developer with Spring Boot, where I gained solid expertise. After 3 years working with backend development, I expanded my knowledge to frontend with React.js. Currently, I combine these specializations to build robust, scalable interfaces with excellent maintainability.
My principle is to develop functional, high-quality technology. I focus on creating systems that efficiently meet user needs while following development best practices and coding standards.

skills.title: My
skills.subtitle: Main technologies I master for back-end and cloud development.
